# deleteAllItems()

**Instance Method**

Deletes all of the items from the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func deleteAllItems()
```

## Removing items and sections

- **deleteItems(_:)**: Deletes the items with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.
- **deleteSections(_:)**: Deletes the sections with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.

items.description: Deletes the items with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.
items.name: deleteItems(_:)

items.description: Deletes the sections with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.
items.name: deleteSections(_:)
